list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Fix: Use timestamp in downloaded video filenames (#1)
Add a timestamp to the downloaded video filenames to prevent overwriting. This ensures that multiple videos can be downloaded without conflicts.

task.summary:
``` feat: Add Instagram Reels to Telegram bot (master)
Added functionality to download Instagram Reels and send them to a specified Telegram channel. Includes handling of rate limits and error messages. New files added for project structure, configuration, and database interaction. ```

feat: Add database functionality (master)
Added a SQLite database to store Telegram channel IDs.
Includes functions to initialize the database, set a channel for a user, and retrieve a user's channel ID.

feat: Add project dependencies (master)
Adds necessary project dependencies to the `requirements.txt` file. This includes libraries for asynchronous operations, HTTP requests, data validation, and more.

feat: Add command to check current channel (master)
Adds a `/mychannel` command to allow users to check their currently set Telegram channel ID for downloads. Improves error messages for when a channel is not set. Refactors database interaction for better readability.

feat: Add README and improve project structure (master)
Added a comprehensive README file explaining the bot's functionality, setup, and future development plans. Also made improvements to the overall project structure for better organization and maintainability.

Fix: Use timestamp in downloaded video filenames (#1)
Add a timestamp to the downloaded video filenames to prevent overwriting. This ensures that multiple videos can be downloaded without conflicts.
